attributes.action: Stop Oswestry Leisure Centre From Closing
attributes.background: Shropshire Council have decided to stop funding Oswestry Leisure Centre.  This comes after building a new Centre 5 years ago for 11 million

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Leisure facilities are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Shropshire Council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

https://shropshire.gov.uk/committee-services/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
